short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take patient documentation off your plate and mind with ezPT Physical Therapy AI Documentation Scribe, Dictation, and Ghostwriter.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
üöÄ Experience the power of Physical Therapy AI documentation in your EMR with ezPT Chrome extension! Say goodbye to tedious note-taking and hello to effortless efficiency. üìù‚ú®

Our innovative extension seamlessly integrates with your existing workflow, allowing you to create patient notes, receive real-time AI-generated drafts, and complete your paperwork in 95% less time. üí°üíª

Physical therapists can automate their notes with ezPT AI in three distinct modes: Scribe, Dictation, and Ghostwriter. 

Each mode caters to your dynamic documentation needs, ensuring that you have the flexibility and tools that adapt to your work schedule effectively.

Ambient Scribe:
‚è±Ô∏è Save time with 100% hands-free documentation. Seek consent and convert your patient conversations into charts with our ambient Scribe.

Dictation:
‚ö° Didn't get consent from the patient or missed to hit record? Do you often find yourself needing to quickly capture thoughts and observations between patient sessions? No worries. Do a quick brain dump with our Dictation mode in between patient sessions.

Ghostwriter:
‚úçÔ∏è Prefer typing? Jot down your shorthand notes and let our Ghostwriter draft a comprehensive SOAP note for you.

Choose any mode. You'll always get a contextual, compliant, and comprehensive note in your writing style. 

Our name is our game! üí™

What else can we do to make your lives easy, PTs? 

Try ezPT today for free! No credit cards needed.

Everything You Need, Nothing You Don't
ezPT is engineered for flexibility, speed and accuracy. You can record patient sessions, dictate or type in notes, and generate insurance-complaint, contextual, comprehensive notes in a few minutes.

About ezPT
ezPT is the leading HIPAA-compliant Physical Therapy AI Documentation software for automating patient notes. Generate accurate notes and easily transfer them directly in your EMR whether you're at desk or on the move. Now, you don't have to skip lunches or work during after-hours. Spend less time drafting the perfect notes. Delegate your paperwork to ezPT!
